item.title: tetris rotation
item.description: Tetris Rotation Logic Basically I used SRS Rotation System When unobstructed, the tetrominoes all rotate purely about a single point. These apparent rotation centers are shown as circles in the diagram. Single Point (Pivot) is different by box size (ie 2, 3, 4) I calculate O block as size of 2 (0, 0), (0, 1), (1, 1), (1, 0) Box size of I block is 4 and 3 for all other blocks
